Worcester.B. E. Ridyard Three-Decker: The B. E. Ridyard Three-Decker is an historic three-decker house at 29 Dewey Street in Worcester, Massachusetts. When the c. 1910 house was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1990, it was noted for its Queen Anne styling, included bands of colored shingling on the front bays, and decorative wood work on the porches.
